#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

== Selecting a Target ==

{{{
if (uri has maddr parameter)
    target = maddr parameter
else
    target = uri.host-part
}}}

== Selecting a Transport ==

{{{
if (uri has transport parameter)
    transport =  uri.transport
else
    if (target is numeric)
        if (uri is secure)
            transport = TLS
        else
            transport = UDP
    else
        if (uri has port)
            if (uri is secure)
                transport = TLS
            else
                transport = UDP
        else
            if (naptr records exist for target)
                if (srv records exist for naptr record)
                    transport = srv.transport
                else
                    if (uri is secure)
                        transport = TLS
                    else
                        transport = UDP
            else
                if (srv records exist for target)
                    transport = srv.transport
                else
                    if (uri is secure)
                        transport = TLS
                    else
                        transport = UDP
}}}
